price: Shkunde trungun e palmës, që të bien mbi ty hurma të freskëta!
arabic: وَهُزِّيٓ إِلَيۡكِ بِجِذۡعِ ٱلنَّخۡلَةِ تُسَٰقِطۡ عَلَيۡكِ رُطَبٗا جَنِيّٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wahuzzī ilayki bijidh'ʿi al-nakhlati tusāqiṭ ʿalayki ruṭaban janiyyan
